keyframes.label: control instructions
keyframes.description: Instructions initially presented. Audio 1 begins.

keyframes.label: heart 1
keyframes.description: Dot appears and travels to first vertex.

keyframes.label: heart 2
keyframes.description: Dot travels to second vertex.

keyframes.label: heart 3
keyframes.description: Dot travels to third vertex...

keyframes.label: heart 4
keyframes.description: Dot returns to the origin.

keyframes.label: heart 5
keyframes.description: Pause to let audio 1 finish.

keyframes.label: vertices 1
keyframes.description: Initial instructions provided. Audio 2 begins.

keyframes.label: vertices 2
keyframes.description: Dot travels to first vertex.

keyframes.label: vertices 3.1
keyframes.description: First vertex is highlighted as a corner..

keyframes.label: vertices 3.2
keyframes.description: Pause to sync audio 2.

keyframes.label: vertices 4
keyframes.description: Origin highlighted as a corner..

keyframes.label: vertices 5
keyframes.description: Instructions about corners and movement given.

keyframes.label: vertices 6.1
keyframes.description: Dot progresses to second vertex.

keyframes.label: vertices 6.1.1
keyframes.description: Pause to let audio 2 conclude.

keyframes.label: vertices 6.2
keyframes.description: Dot pauses at second vertex. Pause before audio 3 begins.

keyframes.label: vertices 7
keyframes.description: Dot pauses at second vertex. Audio 3 begins

keyframes.label: vertices 8
keyframes.description: Description of dot's traversal from V2 to V3 given.

keyframes.label: vertices 9
keyframes.description: Dot progresses to vertex 3. Audio 4 begins

keyframes.label: vertices 10
keyframes.description: Dot pauses and up arrow shown

keyframes.label: vertices 12
keyframes.description: Dot pauses and right arrow shown

keyframes.label: vertices 12
keyframes.description: Dot pauses and audio 4 completes

keyframes.label: vertices 11
keyframes.description: Dot returns to the origin. Audio 5 begins.

keyframes.label: vertices 11
keyframes.description: Dot pauses and down arrow shown.

keyframes.label: vertices 12
keyframes.description: Dot pauses and left arrow shown.

keyframes.label: vertices 12
keyframes.description: Dot pauses at origin.

keyframes.label: vertices 13
keyframes.description: Final instructions about dot behavior given. Audio 6 begins.

keyframes.label: buttons 2
keyframes.description: Buttons initially presented WITH instructions. Audio 7 begins

keyframes.label: buttons 3
keyframes.description: pointer enters screen and moves to box 2

keyframes.label: buttons 4
keyframes.description: pointer pauses on button 2 and audio 7 completes.

keyframes.label: buttons 5
keyframes.description: pointer simulates click

keyframes.label: buttons 6
keyframes.description: box 2 turns green

keyframes.label: buttons 7
keyframes.description: Instructions on changing answer are presented. Audio 8 begins.

keyframes.label: buttons 8
keyframes.description: Pointer moves to box 3

keyframes.label: buttons 9
keyframes.description: Pointer simulates a click

keyframes.label: buttons 10
keyframes.description: Box 2 toggles off and box 3 is activated.

keyframes.label: buttons 11
keyframes.description: Pointer moves to finished button.

keyframes.label: buttons 12
keyframes.description: Pointer pauses on finish button.

keyframes.label: buttons 13
keyframes.description: Pointer simulates click on finish button.

keyframes.label: buttons 14
keyframes.description: Final pause to establish click.

keyframes.label: end practice script
keyframes.description: User is told to begin self-initiating practice. Audio 9 begins
